turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order pizza from that new place Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three medium thick-crust pizzas. The first one, I want pepperoni and sausage. The second one, I want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hawaiian and the third one I really want a barbecue chicken but also buffalo chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you wanted bbq and buffalo sauce together or half and half?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, you are ordering 3 medium thick crust pizzas, one pepperoni and sausage, 1 hawaiin, and 1 bbq and buffalo sauce with chicken, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
